display_help: The Nullifier Mace can fire a volley of energy at all foes in front of the user. The Mace Beam Volley is a Moderate damage area of effect cone attack with a chance to knock foes off their feet. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Medium
display_short_help: Ranged Cone, Moderate DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Knockback
